abstract: Growing numbers of office workers are joining the ergonomic diversity movement. They are standing up, sometimes even walking at treadmill desks, while working. The health risks of sitting for hours are prompting workers to consider alternatives to the office chair.

headline.main: Field Notes in Ergonomic Diversity: Standup Workers Speak
